issue.title: [CI][C++] Travis ARM jobs timeout
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9876](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9876). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The ARM job on Travis-CI often gets close to the 50 minutes timeout, and sometimes it triggers the timeout. We should try to make the build lighter.
